code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import api from'../services/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BillingOverview=()=>{const[bills,setBills]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const fetchBills=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const res=await api.get('/billing');setBills(res.data.data.bills);}catch(err){console.error(err);alert('Error fetching bills');}finally{setLoading(false);}};useEffect(()=>{fetchBills();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container admin-dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Billing Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-compact",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."}):bills.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No bills available"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"manage-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Bill ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Patient"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Payment Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:bills.map(b=>{var _b$patient;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:b.billId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:(_b$patient=b.patient)===null||_b$patient===void 0?void 0:_b$patient.fullName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:new Date(b.date).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:["\u20B9",b.totalAmount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:b.paymentStatus})]},b._id);})})]})})]});};export default BillingOverview;
